text: Daniel Voorhees may refer to: * Daniel W. Voorhees (1827–1897), lawyer and United States Senator from Indiana ** Bust of Daniel W. Voorhees, a public artwork by American artist James Paxton Voorhees * Daniel S. Voorhees, transient restaurant porter who confessed to the 1947 murder of Elizabeth Short * Daniel Spader Voorhees (1852–1935), New Jersey State Treasurer Voorhees, Daniel
title: Daniel Voorhees
